MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
あるいは絢爛なるティアラの完成を。
あるいは最後の一冠、勇猛なる菊の証を。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Or the completion of a glorious tiara.
Or the last crown, the proof of the valiant chrysanthemum.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
またあるいは栄誉ある秋の盾を争うウマ娘たちの、
意気衝天たる様が世を賑わす晩秋。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText: In the late autumn, the world is abuzz with the exuberant mood of horse girls competing for the prestigious Autumn Shield.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
囃子の音に合わせ、曳神輿が往来をゆく。
美しき舞いは三女神に捧げられ、流鏑馬の矢が厄を射祓う。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
The portable shrine is carried along the street to the sound of musical accompaniment.
The beautiful dance is dedicated to the three goddesses, and the arrows of yabusame (archery on horseback) shoot away evil spirits.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText: それは、ウマ娘の、ウマ娘による、ウマ娘のための祭事――
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText: It's a festival for Uma Musume, by Uma Musume, and for Uma Musume.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText: イベントタイトルロゴ表示。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText: Event title logo display.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Monologue

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
『駿大祭』、とうとう近づいてきたね～！　元祖にんじん焼き、
今年こそ早めに屋台に並んで、品切れ前にゲットしなきゃ！
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
"Sundaisai" is finally approaching!　The original carrot roast!
I have to line up early this year and get it before they run out!
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Umamusu A

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
ウマ娘団体それぞれの演し物も楽しみだよね～。
トレセン学園は、今年はなんの担当なのかなぁ……？
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
I'm also looking forward to the performances of each of the Uma Musume groups!
I wonder what Tresen Gakuen will be in charge of this year. ......?
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Umamusu B

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
さて、諸君。ご存知の通り、我々ウマ娘にとって
大切な年中行事である『駿大祭』の開催が間近に迫ってきたな。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Well, gentlemen. As you all know, the "Sundaisai", an important annual event for us Uma Musume
As you all know, the "Sundaisai", an important annual event for us Uma Musume, is coming up soon.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
URAより通達があり、我々トレセン学園が担当する演し物は
『奉納舞』そして『流鏑馬』の2つに決定した。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
We were notified by the URA that there would be two performances by our school.
We were informed by the URA that the two performances we would be in charge of would be "Votive Dance" and "Yabusame".
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
ではこれより、演し物それぞれの参加候補者について発表する。
任意参加ではあるが、栄誉ある職務として全うしてくれると嬉しい。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
I will now announce the candidates for each of the presentations.
Although this is a voluntary participation, I hope you will fulfill your duties with honor.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
まず、三女神に捧ぐ『奉納舞』。
3名の踊り手のうち、1人目は――ゴールドシチー。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
First, the "Dedication Dance" dedicated to the three goddesses.
The first of the three dancers was - Gold City.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
続いて2人目、カレンチャン。
そして3人目は――
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Then the second one, Karen Chan.
And the third one--
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
ねーねー、駿大祭っ！　学園、早めに出られそう！？
奉納舞、絶ッッッ対いい場所で見たいんだけど！！
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Hey, Sundaisai!　Can we leave the school early?
I want to see the dedication dance from the best place possible!
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Umamusu A

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
踊り手シチーさんは、ヤバいよねぇ～。カレンちゃんもさ、
ステージパフォーマンスいっつも完ペキだし――
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Cici, the dancer, is a badass! Karen, too.
Karen's stage performance is always perfect.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Umamusu B

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText: はわわ……あわわわわわわ……。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText: Hawa ...... awahahahaha .......
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Yukino Bijin

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
すンげぇ人気な現役モデルのシチーさんに、
い、『いんふるえんさぁ』？　のカレンさん……。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
I'd like to talk to Ms. Cichy, an incredibly popular model.
I'm not sure what to say.　Karen from .......
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Yukino Bijin

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
三女神さまに捧げる大事な舞の踊り手に、
キラッキラなお2人が選ばれるのはわがる……わがっけど……！
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
The two glittering girls were chosen as the dancers for the important dance dedicated to the three goddesses.
I'm not sure if it's a good thing or not, but it's a good thing. ......
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Yukino Bijin

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
ユキノちゃーん……ユキノちゃんっ？
青い顔してるけど、どうしたの？
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Yukino-chan. ...... Yukino-chan?
What's wrong with your blue face?
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Curren Chan

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText: っと、ごめんねお話し中に！　通知切るね。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText: I'm sorry to interrupt your conversation!　I'll turn off the notification.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Curren Chan

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
ああ、いえいえ……えっと、『ウマいね』の通知ですか？
カレンさんの、そのー、ウマスタの。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Oh, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Karen's, um, umasta's.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Yukino Bijin

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
うん、奉納舞参加します、見に来てねーっていう投稿の！
みんな楽しみにしてくれてるみたいで、カレンうれしいなっ♪
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
I'm going to participate in the dedication dance, so please come and watch!
I'm glad you're looking forward to it, Karen.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Curren Chan

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
みんな……。
あンの～、ちなみに今って、どンくらいウマいねが……？
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Everyone is at .......
By the way, how good is it nowadays ......?
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Yukino Bijin

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText: 今？　えーっと……2.6万？　あ、今2.7万になったよ！
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText: Right now?　Let's see. ......2.6 thousand?　Oh, it's 27,000 now!
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Curren Chan

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
に　ー　て　ん　な　な　ま　ん　っ　！　？
じゅ、10分前の投稿ですよねぇ！？　ひぃええええ……！！
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
What the hell is wrong with you?　What?
It was posted 10 minutes ago, right?　Heeeeeeeee ......!
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Yukino Bijin

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
（あ、シチーさんのマネジさんも投稿してる……
って、こっちももう1万ウマいね超えそうだぁ！？）
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
(Oh, Cichy's Manezi also posted this: ......
And this one's about to go over 10,000 likes too!
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Yukino Bijin

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
（みんなみんな、シチーさんやカレンさんの舞が見てぇンだ……！
その気持ちはすーっごくわがる……わがっからこそ、あたし……！）
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
(Everyone wants to see Cici and Karen dance. ......!
I know that feeling very well ...... and that's why I ......!
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Yukino Bijin

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
そうそう！　この3人でがんばりまーすっていう写真も、
あとで撮ってアップしたいんだけどいいかなっ？
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Yes, yes!　I'd like to take a picture of the three of us saying we're doing our best.
I'd like to take a picture of the three of us together and upload it later, if that's okay.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Curren Chan

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText: 『奉納舞』、いっしょにがんばろうね、ユキノちゃん！！
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText: Let's work together on the "votive dance", Yukino-chan!
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Curren Chan

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText: は……はひぃぃぃ～……！！
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Yukino Bijin

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText: （どうすりゃいいンだぁ～～～！？）
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText: (What am I supposed to do?
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Yukino Bijin

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
『キレイな舞楽しみにしてます』、『ビジュアル大勝利すぎやばい』
『衣装写真ぜひいっぱいあげてください』……か。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
I'm looking forward to the beautiful dance.
I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Gold City

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
…………。
やっぱ、アタシが選ばれたのって――
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
.............
I knew that I was chosen because...
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Gold City

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
――ということで、許可ッ！！
『駿大祭準備合宿』、大いに励んできてくれたまえ！
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
--So, permission granted!
Have a great time at the "Sundaisai Preparation Camp"!
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Chairwoman Akikawa

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
期待ッ！！　私も駿大祭本番が楽しみだ！！
奉納舞の美しさはもちろんのこと――
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Expectations!　I'm looking forward to the Sundaisai performance too!
Not to mention the beauty of the dedication dance.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Chairwoman Akikawa

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
勇猛ッ！！　シンボリルドルフに、ナリタブライアン。
君たち2人の迫力満点であろう流鏑馬も、必ず見に行くぞっ！
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Brave!　Simbolildorf and Naritabu Ryan.
I'm sure I'll be there to see the two of you and your powerful yabusame!
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Chairwoman Akikawa

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText: ……どうも。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText: Thanks .......
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Narita Brian

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
ありがとうございます、理事長。誉れある任命に感謝し、
役割を十全に果たせるよう、誠心誠意励んで参ります。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Thank you, Chancellor. I thank you for the honorable appointment.
I will work hard and sincerely to fulfill my role to the fullest.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
……獅子奮迅たる活躍を見せるウマ娘らのおかげで、
ここ最近のレース界の盛り上がりは凄まじい。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
...... Thanks to the lion's share of Uma Musume's success.
I'm not sure if I'm going to be able to do it, but I'm going to try.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
なればこそ、より一層の発展とウマ娘たちの安全を祈願する
『駿大祭』の担う役割は、例年より重いと考えます。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText: Therefore, I believe that the role of "Sundaisai" to pray for the further development and safety of the horse girls is more important than ever.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText: しかし同時に――我々ならばそれを果たせるとも、断言できます。
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText: But at the same time - I can assure you that we can do it.
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf

MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.jpText:
ご期待ください、理事長。
『駿大祭』、例年以上に盛り上げることをお約束します！
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.enText:
Please look forward to it, Chancellor.
I promise you that the Sundaisai will be even more exciting than usual!
MEI7GSYNSL27PEYZ5SZQJXYPCPOQ7724.name: Symboli Rudolf
